mapper.insert: insert into Banner (brand_id, manager_name, manager_tel, start_date, end_date, banner_name, banner_message, status, brand_url) values(#{brandId}, #{managerName}, #{managerTel}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{bannerName}, #{bannerMessage}, 'PENDING', #{brandUrl} )
mapper.update: update Banner (managerName, managerTel, updatedAt, endDate, bannerName, bannerMessage, status, brandUrl) values(#{managerName}, #{managerTel}, #{updatedAt}, #{endDate}, #{bannerName}, #{bannerMessage}, 'PENDING', #{brandUrl} )
